sourcesContent:
import { Card, CardContent, Divider, Toolbar, Typography } from "@mui/material";

import { List, ListItem,} from "@mui/material";
import { pink } from "@mui/material/colors";
const Header = () => {
    return (
        <>
            <Toolbar>
                <Card gutterBottom >
                    <CardContent>
                        <Typography variant="h3" gutterBottom>Simple Omelette Recipe</Typography>
                        <Typography gutterBottom>An easy and quick dish, perfect fro one meal. This classic omelette combines beaten eggs cooked to perfection, optionaly filled with your choice of cheese, vegetables or meats</Typography>

                    </CardContent>
                    <CardContent sx={{backgroundColor: pink[100], borderRadius: 2, padding: 2,}}>
                        <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
                            Preparation Time
                        </Typography>
                        <List >
                            <ListItem>Total: Approximately 10 minutes</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Preparation: 5 minutes</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Cooking: 5 minutes</ListItem>
                        </List>
                    </CardContent>

                    <CardContent>
                    <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
                            Ingredients
                        </Typography>
                        <List >
                            <ListItem>2-3 large eggs</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Salt to taste</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Pepeer to taste</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>1 tablespoon of butter or oil</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Optional filings: cheese, diced vegetables, cooked meats, herbs</ListItem>
                        </List>
                    </CardContent>
                    <Divider/>
                    <CardContent>
                    <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
                            Instructions
                        </Typography>
                        <List >
                            <ListItem>Beats the eggs: In a bowl, beat the eggs with a pich of salt and pepper until they are well mixed. You can add a tablespoon of water or milk for a fluffier texture</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Heat the pan: Place a non stick frying pan over medium heat and butter and oil.</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Cook the omelette: Once the butter is melted and bubbling, pour in the eggs. Tilt the pan to ensure the egss evenly coat the surface</ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Fold and serve: As the omelette continues to cook, carefully lift one edge and fold it over the fillings. Let it cook for another minute, then slide into the plate. </ListItem>
                            <ListItem>Optional filings: cheese, diced vegetables, cooked meats, herbs</ListItem>
                        </List>
                    </CardContent>
                </Card>
            </Toolbar>
        </>
    );
};

export default Header;
